titles: To the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled a supplement to the Proposal for a colledge of industry, shewing a regular constant imploy for the poor, is the best foundation of trade, and the greatest improvement to the nation, and consequently support to the government ...
author: Bellers, John, 1654-1725.

notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
